title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Only posters and stickers approved by the Commissioner of

Motor Vehicles may be displayed on the windshield or rear windows of motor
vehicles registered in New York. Posters or stickers on the windshield and rear
window interfere with visibility. Limiting the number and size of posters and
stickers minimizes this interference. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
